tweet: Back when I thought bitcoin was dead, I was a shitcoiner. Lots of us were.   I mined LTC, bought Ethereum, mined Monero, ran various masternodes and staked PoS coins. BCH (now $BSV) brought me back to Satoshi’s Vision.   What was your shitcoin journey?   https://t.co/LvWbTLCljO
